name: Halloween Witchcraft
description:
Halloween Witchcraft is a small game that lets you explore a witch's house.

This game is a small experiment that I made for fun in the spirit of Halloween. I hope you enjoy it. If people show interest, I'll add more features and expand upon it.

Keyboard / Mouse Controls

  • WASD / arrow keys to move the player
  • mouse to rotate the camera
  • E to interact with the objects

Controllers are not supported yet.

Not tested on macOS.

Suggestions and feedback are greatly appreciated. 

http://madakikoeru.tumblr.com
